member.name: M:ScoreCombination.API.Controllers.ScoreCombinationController.Post(ScoreCombination.Application.Dtos.ScoreCombinationRequestDto)
member.summary: Get the request from body, store the request and returns the score combination result.
member.param: Request is an object that has one list of long called 'Sequence' and a long number called 'Target'.
member.returns: If there are no errors, it returns the combination result.

member.name: M:ScoreCombination.API.Controllers.ScoreCombinationController.Get(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get the dates from url and returns all requests made between them.
member.returns: If there are no errors, it returns a list with all the api calls between the dates.
